_meanings:
{@--5@} The occasion of a discourse,
subject, topic.

{@--6@} The prologue of a
drama; see {#prastAvanA#} below.

{@--7@} The
prelude or introductory words of a
{%Sāman%}.

{@--8@} An introductory praise.
({#prastAve#} {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} on a suitable occasion,
seasonably. {#prastAvena#} {1} 
incidentally, occasionally. {2} suitably).

a conversation in
which each interlocutor takes a part
